description: This file is the main entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the root component into the DOM, setting up routing with BrowserRouter, and applying global CSS styles.
published: rendered React component tree; no explicit exports

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components in the specified DOM container.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM starting from the root.
